title.rendered: Cheap and Highly Affordable Matheran Hotels

content.rendered:
Visiting Matheran of Maharashtra, India provides people with utmost relaxation from the hustle of the city. Located in the hill range of Sahyadri, Matheran is a great vacation spot for people looking to find peace and tranquillity amidst the beauty of nature. Spectacular sceneries of lush green valleys, picturesque waterfalls, lakes, and trails are only among the attractions that await tourists in this area of India. Although Matheran is nestled in a small hill and May only is a small hill station, there is no shortage of hotels here. Matheran hotels and accommodation packages abound in the area, ranging from heritage resorts, luxury hotels, and budget and economy hotels.

Most of the hotels in Matheran are rated three stars, and there are several of these hotels in the area. Prices of these hotels are already at a low but people may still find some cheaper alternatives to these hotels if they want to. There are many affordable hotels in Matheran that are just perfect for people who are in a shoestring budget but would like to experience what Matheran has to offer.

The Sayeban Hotel Matheran is one of the many budget hotels Matheran that tourists may enjoy staying at. The establishment has received positive reviews from several visitors who have stayed in this humble inn during their visit to India. Some of the amenities and facilities that tourists can find in this hotel Matheran include deluxe, self-contained rooms, laundry service, function area for games and small gatherings, restaurant that offers Punjabi, Chinese, and Gujarati Thali dishes, an ambulance and a doctor on call during emergencies, spacious rooms decorated with modern technology and amenities, recreation area, CCTV, and many more. The Sayeban Hotel also offers tourists easy access to the different sightseeing spots of Matheran.

Another hotel that is worth checking while visiting Matheran is the Panorama Hotel. Rated three stars, the Panorama Hotel offers affordable rates to its patrons while still maintaining good service. Amenities and facilities that visitors can enjoy in this establishment include a laundry service, room service, car parking, tennis court, 28 furnished rooms with hot and cold water, CCTV, telephone, badminton court, children’s park and baby care facility to name just a few. The Panorama Hotel also has a swimming pool, banquet area, and health club for those who are health conscious.

Another three star hotel in this area is the Horseland Hotel and Mountain Spa. Nestled in Vitthalrao Kotwal Road, this establishment is only a stone’s throw away from Matheran Railway Station. It also provides easy access to Mumbai Airport and Matheran Car Park Bay. Moreover, guests staying in this hotel can enjoy ayurvedic massage, steam bath, sauna, and yoga classes if they want to. The hotel provides these amenities to their guests. Other facilities and amenities offered by this hotel include a doctor on call during emergencies, massage parlor, discotheque, mini fridge for each room, free room service, safety deposit box, colored TV, conference room, and function room to name a few.

Another hotel Matheran that may attract tourists because of their economy and budget packages is the Rangoli Retreat. This is not a three star hotel but merely a budget hotel meant to provide tourists affordable rates on accommodations. One of the cheap hotels in the area, Hotel Rangoli Retreat, provides its guests with convenience and relaxation during their stay. The establishment is situated near the railway station and provides people easy access to the marketplace. It is also near some of the beautiful scenic spots of Matheran, allowing people a good view of some of the spectacular falls, lush green mountainsides, and striking canopy of vegetation.

Some of the facilities and amenities offered by Hotel Rangoli Retreat include a convention centre, secure parking space, swimming pool, secretarial assistance, travel desk facility, banquet hall, in-house movie, doctor on call, and safety deposit box to name a few. Guests can choose from three room accommodations in this hotel, namely, double, deluxe, and suite accommodations.

Hotel Royal is also another cheap hotel to look out for in Matheran. It is located very near the local market and is built with 60 rooms, all lavishly decorated to provide elegance and comfort to its visitors. This is one of the many cheap hotels Matheran that not only provide rates that are easy on the wallet, but also great service to its visitors. Hotel Royal is an award winning hotel in Matheran and it boasts of staff that offers warm hospitality to guests. Tourists staying in this hotel can enjoy amenities such as refrigerators in all rooms, room service, doctor on call, restaurant that offers multiple cuisines, children’s park, satellite TV, and laundry service to name a few.

Matheran hotels may be cheap and highly affordable but they are mostly clean and designed specifically to provide comfort and convenience to guests.
